Package edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.hadoopinterface.infrastructure

Class Summary
ArgumentParser This class is used to parse the command-line arguments used by the Hadoop interface.
CuratorClientArgParser  
CuratorJob A job configuration object for a Hadoop job that interfaces with the Curator.
CuratorKillerReducer A reducer used to shut down the Curator and NLP annotation tools running on Hadoop nodes.
FileSystemHandler A class to handle all the filesystem interactions in the Hadoop interface.
HadoopRecord A version of the Curator's document record, for use on the Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS), which does not rely on database calls.
HadoopSerializationHandler Used for writing Thrift objects to the file system.
JobHandler A class to handle annotation dependencies outside of the Curator.
LocalFileSystemHandler  
MessageLogger An object which standardizes the logging of errors and warnings across the project.
RecordTools A utility class for working with Records.
SerializationHandler Used for writing Thrift objects to the file system.
StreamGobbler  
 

Enum Summary
AnnotationMode Defines "modes" for the Curator-to-Hadoop interface (i.e., annotation types which the tool will run with.
ViewType Represents a view type (e.g., Labeling, Forest, Clustering) used by the Curator.
